merquaco.periodicity.get_periodicity_vals_all_z

merquaco.periodicity.get_periodicity_vals_all_z(transcripts: DataFrame)

Performs periodicity analysis in all z-planes collapsed

Parameters:

transcripts (pd.DataFrame) – Transcripts table

Returns:

Periodicity metric in (x, y)

Return type:

tuple
